org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo checking deployed web files ls -ahl if [ -e ~/chaipcr/deploy ] then echo web files deploy done successfully else echo error deploying ssh files exit 1 fi
#Replace uEnv.txt echo Replacing uEnv.txt cd ~/chaipcr/deploy/ ./replace_uEnv.txt.sh #sed -i "s/errors=remount-ro/errors=continue/" /etc/fstab
echo patching rc.local cd /etc #if [ ! -e rc.local ] #then echo "Overwriting rc.local." cat > rc.local << EOF #!/bin/sh -e # # rc.local # # This script is executed at the end of each multiuser runlevel. # Make sure that the script will "exit 0" on success or any other # value on error. # # In order to enable or disable this script just change the execution # bits. # # By default this script does nothing.
exit 0
EOF chmod +x rc.local #fi
cd /etc patch -i ~/chaipcr/deploy/device/rc.local.patch || (echo error patching rc.local) cd sync
echo Disable Mass-storage mini-usb cd /opt/scripts/boot || exit 1 patch -i ~/chaipcr/deploy/device/storage.disable.patch || (echo error adding storage disable patch && exit 1) cd ~ sync
echo Update Networking sed -i 's/#auto eth0/auto eth0/' /etc/network/interfaces sed -i 's/#iface eth0/iface eth0/' /etc/network/interfaces
cp /etc/dhcp/dhclient.conf /etc/dhcp/dhclient.conf.bak #sed -i 's/#timeout 60/timeout 20/' /etc/dhcp/dhclient.conf #sed -i 's/#retry 60/retry 20/' /etc/dhcp/dhclient.conf sed -i 's/#reboot/reboot/' /etc/dhcp/dhclient.conf
echo Disabling usb1 cd /opt/scripts/boot || exit 1
[ -e temp.patch ] && rm temp.patch cat >> temp.patch << EOF --- am335x_evm.sh 2018-10-04 15:06:36.889361025 +0200 +++ am335x_evm.sh 2018-10-04 15:06:26.649444094 +0200 @@ -682,17 +682,17 @@ compare_major="4" compare_minor="4"
-if [ "\${kernel_major}" -lt "\${compare_major}" ] ; then +#if [ "\${kernel_major}" -lt "\${compare_major}" ] ; then use_old_g_multi -elif [ "\${kernel_major}" -eq "\${compare_major}" ] ; then - if [ "\${kernel_minor}" -lt "\${compare_minor}" ] ; then - use_old_g_multi - else - use_libcomposite - fi -else - use_libcomposite -fi +#elif [ "\${kernel_major}" -eq "\${compare_major}" ] ; then +# if [ "\${kernel_minor}" -lt "\${compare_minor}" ] ; then +# use_old_g_multi +# else +# use_libcomposite +# fi +#else +# use_libcomposite +#fi
if [ -f /var/lib/misc/dnsmasq.leases ] ; then systemctl stop dnsmasq || true EOF
patch -i temp.patch || (echo error adding usb1 patch && exit 1) rm temp.patch
exit 0
